Text:
The game works great, thanks! :D

One thing though, the cutscenes in between missions have no sound. Good thing I already know the story because I have it on ps3.
I have done what is suggested here and the game still does not work. Is there something special I need to do besides install the game and fix the resolution? (windows 7 user)

I have Windows 7 x64 What worked for me is removing the Compatibility Mode on "MirrorsEdge.exe" in the "Binaries" folder
[Right-Click]-->[Properties]-->[Compatibility]-->[Uncheck - Compatibility mode]
